intro: Sanicula nanchuanensis, commonly known as the Nanchuan sanicula, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Apiaceae, which includes many aromatic herbs and vegetables. The plant features compound leaves with a finely divided structure and produces small, greenish-yellow flowers arranged in umbels. It is typically found in moist, shaded forest environments. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
